MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL11 and LL14 postcode areas of Chirk, affecting properties in Church View, Maes Y Waun and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:52PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the electrical network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 4:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:55PM on 5th April 2021.
